Antenatal care
73
The kinds of topics covered in 
antenatal education are:
• health in pregnancy;
• exercises	to	keep	you	fit	
during pregnancy and help 
you in labour;
• what happens during 
labour and birth;
• coping with labour and 
information	about	different	
types of pain relief;
• how to help yourself during 
labour and birth;
• relaxation techniques;
• how to
